snippet.title: Deadlight Gameplay (PC HD)
snippet.description:
● Buy this and other Games up to 80% off: http://g2a.com/r/discountme

//- Info
The world has ended. There is no hope. No new beginning. Only the survivors. DEADLIGHT follows the journey of Randall Wayne, a man searching for his family across Seattle during the aftermath of a 1980s event that has decimated life on earth. This visually stunning Cinematic Survival Platformer will challenge you to run, jump, climb, and struggle for your life as you look for answers and the ones you love.


//- Opinion
Really enjoyable.


//- System
OS: Windows 7 Home Premium x64
MB: Asus Sabertooth Z77 Sockel 1155
CPU: Intel Core i7-3770K 4.1GHz
GPU: Gainward GeForce GTX 570 Phantom
RAM: Corsair Vengeance 2x4GB 1600MHz


//- Software
Fraps (latest version)
Sony Vegas Pro (latest version)


//- Presented you by:
http://deluxe-tools.net/
http://twitter.com/#!/deluxe345
http://www.facebook.com/deluxe345
